newsitem.title: USA: Systems of Excellence sued in class action.
newsitem.headline: Systems of Excellence sued in class action.

text.p: A purported class action suit has been filed against Systems of Excellence Inc on behalf of those who purchased the company's common stock between December 26, 1995, and October 7, 1996, lawyers for the plaintiffs said.

They said the suit, filed in U.S. District Court for the Southern District of Florida, alleges Systems of Excellence, its former chief executive and chairman, Charles Huttoe, and certain selling shareholders issued securities without an effective registration statement.
It also alleges the defendants manipulated the stock price through misrepresentations.
